title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
### Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels

#### Product Details:

- **Product Name:** Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels
- **Pack Contents:**
  - 12 Huge Rolls
  - 2 Packs (each containing 6 rolls)
- **Sheet Count per Roll:** 158
- **Ply:** 2-ply
- **Equivalent to Regular Rolls:** 38 rolls
- **Sheet Size:** 2-ply
- **Absorbency:** Up to 75% more absorbent than leading 1-ply brand (Bounty Paper Towels)
- **Flex-a-Size:** True
- **Color:** White

#### Key Features:

- **Super Absorbent:** These paper towels are designed to be more absorbent than regular 1-ply brands, making them perfect for cleaning up spills and messes efficiently.
- **Flex-a-Size:** This innovative technology allows you to adjust the size of the roll to fit any dispenser, ensuring you always have the right size for your needs.
- **White Color:** Ideal for any home or office setting, providing a clean and modern look.
- **Eco-Friendly:** With 12 huge rolls, this pack offers a convenient and cost-effective solution for your paper towel needs.
- **Bounty Paper Towels Comparison:** Outperforming the leading 1-ply brand, these paper towels are a step above the competition.

#### Perfect for:

- **Home Cleaning:** Perfect for kitchens, bathrooms, and other cleaning tasks.
- **Guests and Visitors:** Keep your home or office spotlessly clean and well-prepared for guests.
- **Cost-Effective:** Save money with a larger quantity of paper towels that are more absorbent.

### Why Choose Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels?

- **Superior Absorbency:** Get the most out of your paper towels with up to 75% more absorbency.
- **Flexibility:** Adjust the size of the roll to fit any dispenser, saving space and reducing waste.
- **Environmentally Friendly:** Enjoy the convenience of a larger quantity without compromising on sustainability.

Order now and experience the benefits of Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels for yourself!
